content: CPF Retirement AMA 1M65 Asked by AnonymousAsked on 07 Nov 2018You’ve achieve 1M65. How has that changed your life and how are you funding your life now if you’re not working?Are you still working today? Or are you already retired/semi-retired?1 answerAnswerBump0
Answers (1)Sort By Most UpvoteMost UpvoteMost Recent

Loo Cheng Chuan, Founder at 1M65 MovementLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Nov 2018After establishing up 1M65, I obtained the freedom and flexibility to pursue the life that I truly like and want for myself. After 20 years of working in the corporate world, I am now able to pursue what I really like and enjoy - which is the excitement and thrill of a entrepreneurial life. This business which I have established is also funding my life at the moment.0 comments0
